title: Portfolio of Gabriel
ai_cv_maker_description: Add your background, paste the job description, choose your preferred language or tone, and receive a polished CV plus cover letter in under a minute.
bookinvideo_description: Summary of the book Clean Code where I present situations in which it is possible to apply the concepts described in the book. The first version of the platform was built with WordPress, now i am migrating it to Angular and Node
elleve_description: Elleve is an HR Tech and ED Tech company that financially supports employees' tuition fees for courses at partner educational institutions.
elleve_responsabilties: I worked on developing the payroll loan simulation functionality, integrating the system with APIs from financial partners.
I contributed to building a complete ecosystem of courses from partner institutions, participating from the end-user platform to the internal sales and offer control system.
The solutions developed broadened access to education, allowing more people to finance their courses safely and affordably, while also making the process more sustainable for the company.
